panels.visual: Forge fair with Barth's display Prismor and Malrik approaching Smoke, fire, metalwork displayed
panels.dialogue: Barth: "Prismor! Malrik! Come, try your hand at the forge!"
Barth: "Though I must warn you... the mechanistic essence isn't cooperating today. And some of my frozen iron has gone missing."

panels.visual: Malrik examining forge area Prismor's hand on greatsword
panels.dialogue: Malrik: "Missing? That's concerning. Who would steal from you?" Barth: "I've seen cloaked figures. Nobles I don't recognize. Drow I've never met."
Pocky: "Did you say frozen iron? That's mechanistic essence metal... crucial for the alignment!"
